mdui:UIInfo.mdui:Description: The CSUconnect Test Federation Test Shibboleth Service Provider is designed to allow you to test your Shibboleth IdP Attribute Resolution and Release Policies. It will return to you a list of attributes successfully asserted as well as allowing you to review Shibboleth SP log information.
